title: How NFL players prepare for the coldest games of the year
content: Even as beards freeze and fingers lose feeling, NFL players find ways to handle ridiculously cold temperatures.

title: 20 charged in college hoops point-shaving plot
content: Twenty men, including many former college basketball players, have been charged in a point-shaving scheme that involved more than 29 games being fixed, according to a federal indictment.

title: Sources: Kuminga demands trade from Warriors
content: Warriors forward Jonathan Kuminga has demanded a trade away from Golden State, league sources tell ESPN.

title: Sources: Giants finalizing deal with Harbaugh
content: While contract numbers are still being finalized, John Harbaugh is ready to accept the Giants' head coaching job and the team is expected to hire him as soon as possible, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: Harden: Surging Clips 'can come all the way back'
content: James Harden voiced his belief that the Clippers can climb from an early-season hole into playoff contention and dismissed the idea that the struggles would drive him away.

title: Source: Commanders to hire son of Doug Williams
content: The Commanders are hiring D.J. Williams, the son of franchise great Doug Williams, to be their quarterbacks coach, the latest addition to a new-look staff under Dan Quinn.

title: Federer understands Alcaraz's 'tough' Slam chase
content: Roger Federer said he won't be the one to remind Carlos Alcaraz about how hard it is to complete a career Grand Slam.

title: Texas knocks off No. 10 Vanderbilt in latest upset
content: Texas handed No. 10 Vanderbilt its first loss the season 80-64 on Wednesday night, giving the Longhorns consecutive victories over AP Top 25 teams.

title: 'Gold or bust' as U.S. NHL players think of Games
content: The U.S. is confident going into the Olympics despite not winning a "best-on-best" international competition at the adult level since the 1996 World Cup of Hockey or men's Games gold since the 1980 "Miracle on Ice" team.

title: üèà Kiper's Big Board: Ranking  NFL draft prospects
content: Mel Kiper Jr. is stacking the top 25 players for the NFL draft, starting with Fernando Mendoza. See who follows him after Dante Moore decided to return to school.

title: 'What did I do, man?' How James Nnaji set off a college hoops controversy
content: The first men's player to be drafted then cleared by the NCAA sent shockwaves through the sport. Here's how and why.

title: Potential trade targets to watch for 28 NBA teams: Why two franchises don't have a candidate
content: With the NBA trade deadline looming, we evaluated the players most likely to get dealt -- and why their roster status is precarious.

title: Meet 'Dillon the villain': The NBA's biggest antagonist beloved by teammates
content: Dillon Brooks felt unwanted in Memphis but was beloved in Houston and has the Suns overachieving this season.

title: ESPN's 2025 All-America team: The top players at every position
content: From Fernando Mendoza and Jeremiyah Love to Jacob Rodriguez and Rueben Bain Jr., here are the best of the best.

title: Rams' offense flows through ... its running game? Why it's crucial to their playoff run
content: Los Angeles has the second-most-efficient run game of the past decade -- behind its 2018 ground attack.

title: Nine teams that need to turn around their seasons -- now
content: From expected Final Four contenders like Kentucky and beyond, these teams have work to do in the final stretch.

title: Kershaw, Verlander, Scherzer: Which pitcher is this generation's true ace?
content: Three future Hall of Famers have dominated the conversation. We break down who the king of the hill is for his generation.

title: Fastest skater, hardest shot, more: The Olympics' best at every skill
content: The rosters are set, the rink is (mostly) ready. Here are the key players to watch at the 2026 Games.

title: The 2027 NFL draft class is stacked! 45 players to watch over the next 15 months
content: Dante Moore is returning to Oregon, making an already deep 2027 class that much better. Who else will scouts be watching for next year's draft?

title: Transfer rumors, news: PSG eye Chelsea's Enzo Fern√°ndez
content: Enzo Fern√°ndez has admirers at Paris Saint-Germain, and Atl√©tico Madrid want Wolves' Jo√£o Gomes. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Replacing Amorim was only the start: Man United have more club-defining decisions ahead
content: Questions abound for Man United: Will the Glazers take the exit clause to sell? Who will be the permanent coach? Will Rashford return? And more!

title: Rival leagues, charter flights and T-shirts: 11 moments that led to WNBA labor strife
content: CBA negotiations intensified in recent months, but previous events helped spark the stalemate between the WNBA and WNBPA.

title: A slam for Scheffler? What's next for Rory? Storylines to watch heading into 2026 PGA Tour season
content: What will the biggest names on tour do in 2026? What will Brooks Koepka's return look like? We dive into some of the biggest stories to watch as the season gets started

title: Men's pound-for-pound rankings: A new No. 1 crowned, plus a top-10 return
content: Oleksandr Usyk takes over Terence Crawford and a familiar face makes his return to the list. Here are the latest ESPN P4P rankings.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Kon Knueppel leads the league in 3s made
content: Eric Karabell forecasts what to expect from notable players such as Kon Knueppel, Trae Young, Jalen Johnson and more.

title: Maha triumph for BJP? Exit polls forecast Mahayuti sweep in BMC; Thackerays stumble
content: Exit polls project a significant victory for the Mahayuti alliance in the BMC polls, with projections indicating they will surpass 130 seats. The Shiv Sena (UBT)‚ÄìMNS alliance is expected to secure just over 60 seats, falling short of expectations. The elections saw nearly 50% voter turnout across Mumbai and 28 other municipal corporations in Maharashtra.

title: The Boomerang risk: How Trump's 'help' could save Khamenei's regime in Iran
content: History suggests outside military pressure often ends up rescuing Tehran. Even the prospect of US or Israeli strikes can redirect public anger away from regime misrule and toward sheer national survival, splinter protest alliances, and give authorities cover for a far harsher crackdown. At a time when Iran‚Äôs leadership is fighting to reassert control, foreign force could deliver its most potent weapon: nationalism.

title: US troops return to Qatar base, Iran reopens airspace: US strike on Tehran called off?
content: US aircraft are returning to Qatar's Al Udeid base as security alerts are lowered, following President Trump's indication of easing Iran's protest crackdown. Iran reopened its airspace after a temporary closure due to fears of US military action. While tensions appear to have eased, the situation remains uncertain.

title: Bird poop halts India Open match; contradicts BAI's claims of 'clean' arena
content: Bird droppings disrupted play at the India Open badminton tournament for the second consecutive day. Following a monkey sighting, the men's singles match between HS Prannoy and Loh Kean Yew was halted twice due to droppings falling from the stadium ceiling. This incident echoes earlier concerns about venue conditions raised by Danish players.

title: Watch: US seizes another oil tanker; 4th such op since Maduro capture
content: US forces intercepted the oil tanker Veronica in the Caribbean as part of an operation to control Venezuelan oil shipments. This seizure, conducted under Operation Southern Spear, marks the latest move in a campaign to dismantle a "ghost fleet" and enforce sanctions, with officials stating oil leaving Venezuela must be coordinated lawfully.

title: ‚ÄòStop coding‚Äô, says Nvidia CEO to engineers; says this is what they should do instead
content: Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang aims for engineers to code zero percent, leveraging AI assistants like Cursor to tackle complex, undiscovered problems. He believes this 'Purpose vs Task' approach, akin to radiology's evolution, will elevate human roles. While some, like Cursor's CEO, caution against unchecked AI development, Huang remains confident in this human-centric future for innovation.

title: 'Attempted to flee': Coast guard intercepts Pakistani fishing vessel in Arabian Sea - Watch
content: An Indian Coast Guard ship intercepted a Pakistani fishing vessel, Al-Madina, with nine crew members, found operating within Indian waters near the International Maritime Boundary Line. The vessel attempted to flee towards Pakistan when challenged but was successfully intercepted and boarded. The boat is now being towed to Porbandar for further investigation.

title: Gates Foundation shut down begins: $9bn outlay, 500 jobs to go; closure set for 2045
content: Bill Gates is initiating the phased closure of his influential foundation by 2045, with a record $9 billion budget planned for 2026. The organization will cut up to 500 staff positions over five years to manage operating costs.

title: Suicide, heart attack: Two deaths in West Bengal 'linked' to SIR; kin cite anxiety
content: Two individuals, a booth-level officer and a senior citizen, have died in West Bengal, with families alleging links to the ongoing Special Intensive Revision of electoral rolls.  Growing anxiety over the exercise has reportedly led to multiple deaths and illnesses across the state, prompting concerns from the Chief Minister.

title: B'desh cricket in turmoil: 'Embarrassing & deeply disappointing'- star player slams BCB
content: Bangladesh all-rounder Mehidy Hasan Miraz expressed deep disappointment over BCB director M Nazmul Islam's recent comments, which he believes fuel a misleading narrative about player compensation and disrespect the team's efforts. Miraz emphasized that player earnings are generated through performance and participation in tournaments, not from taxpayers' money, highlighting the financial realities of the sport.

title: Zuckerberg hired Wang for $14B, now they're clashing: AI team in chaos; new boss moves in
content: Meta's new structure reveals tension between Mark Zuckerberg and Alexandr Wang, the $14 billion AI recruit. Wang finds Zuckerberg's micromanagement stifling, while staff question his leadership for Meta's AI ambitions. A recent strategy clash highlighted differing priorities, with Wang pushing for cutting-edge AI over immediate product integration.

title: 'Insurrection Act': Trump threatens to deploy military to quash anti-ICE stirs
content: President Trump threatened to invoke the Insurrection Act in Minnesota following a federal agent-involved shooting and subsequent protests. The incident, which saw protesters clashing with law enforcement, further escalated tensions in the city. The Insurrection Act allows the president to deploy military forces domestically under specific circumstances.

title: Bulldozers clearing bodies from streets: Iranians in India reveal horror of deadly protests
content: Reports from Iran paint a grim picture: overflowing hospitals, streets cleared by earthmovers, and families charged for their children's bullets. Protests have morphed into a struggle for survival, with citizens facing severe economic hardship and brutal crackdowns. Iranians abroad are raising their voices, seeking support and highlighting the dire situation back home.

title: Shortened ISL gets AFC approval, but Indian clubs lose direct entry to ACL slots
content: Because of the delayed start to the season, Indian clubs will not be able to complete the mandatory 24 matches ‚Äî across the top-tier league and domestic cup ‚Äî required for direct entry into AFC club competitions.

title: Patrick and Brittany Mahomes surprise Randi: 'Felt so loved' in family moment
content: Patrick Mahomes and Brittany Mahomes surprised Randi Mahomes with an emotional early 50th birthday celebration during the NFL offseason. The gathering took place at Mahomes‚Äô Kansas City restaurant, 1587 Prime, and included Jackson Mahomes and close family members. Randi later shared that she felt incredibly loved and grateful for the unexpected moment.

title: BMC exit polls: Axis My India predicts clean sweep for BJP-led Mahayuti
content: Axis My India's exit poll projects a significant win for the BJP-led NDA in the BMC elections, potentially securing 131-151 of 227 seats. The election, held after a nine-year delay, saw a turnout of 46-50% and was marked by controversy over indelible ink allegations.

title: IND vs NZ: 'Not doing a lot'- India coach throws Nitish Reddy under the bus
content: India's assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate acknowledged Nitish Kumar Reddy's struggle to impress despite opportunities, while noting Rohit Sharma's lack of recent match practice. The team might have misjudged conditions, potentially needing an extra spinner. KL Rahul's strong form offers batting order flexibility, and Ravindra Jadeja's bowling is deemed improving despite recent wicket scarcity.

title: Iran crisis: US carrier strike group moves towards Middle East; tensions flare
content: Amidst escalating US-Iran tensions and widespread protests in Iran, a US carrier strike group is being redeployed from the South China Sea to the Middle East. This significant military shift coincides with Washington deliberating various options against Tehran, while regional neighbours express concerns about instability.  US personnel in Qatar have been advised to leave as a precaution.

title: 2nd BDO office vandalised in Bengal: SIR hearing was underway in Dinajpur; FIR filed
content: An agitated mob vandalized and torched the Goalpokher-II BDO office in North Dinajpur, West Bengal, during a Special Intensive Revision hearing. Around 300 people reportedly destroyed property worth Rs 20 lakh and injured police and staff. This follows similar violence at the Farakka BDO office.

title: Maha civic polls: Indelible ink erased? State election panel clarifies, warns voters
content: In a decisive move, the Maharashtra Election Commission has labeled the removal of indelible ink as a serious breach of electoral conduct amidst reports of voters attempting to register multiple votes in local body elections. Although some argue that the ink can be easily wiped off, the SEC emphasizes that their meticulous voting records are designed to thwart this practice.

title: 'Dhurandhar' crosses Rs 1300 crore worldwide, beats 'Pushpa 2'
content: Ranveer Singh's spy thriller 'Dhurandhar' continues its impressive box office dominance, surpassing ‚Çπ1300 crore worldwide. The film saw a significant jump on Makar Sankranti, outperforming major hits like 'Pushpa 2' and 'Chhaava' on day 41. Despite new releases, 'Dhurandhar' remains a strong contender, with attention now on 'Border 2' to challenge its run.

title: Kirk Cousins' CBS gig after Falcons flop sparks future questions
content: Kirk Cousins and the Atlanta Falcons face a defining offseason after missing the playoffs. Cousins joins CBS as a guest analyst while Atlanta weighs a major contract decision ahead of March. With cap implications, shifting leadership, and an uncertain quarterback future, Cousins‚Äô media move adds intrigue to what comes next for both sides.

title: 'Border 2' trailer out: Sunny Deol roars into the battlefield to defend India
content: 'Border 2' trailer wowed private viewers with explosive action, emotion, patriotism, and epic dialogues. Varun Dhawan leads army, Diljit Dosanjh flies air force, Ahan Shetty commands navy. Sunny Deol roars as boss with "Hai jurrattt‚Ä¶" zinger. Top VFX, sound. Releases Jan 23, 2026.

title: India‚Äôs GCC surge: From offshore units to growth engines - here's why it matters
content: Global Capability Centres (GCCs) are transforming from mere cost centers to innovation hubs, driving product development and strategic decisions for multinational corporations.  Hiring is now focused on specialised skills in AI, cloud, and data, with GCCs increasingly owning end-to-end product lifecycles and shaping global strategies, signaling a profound shift in the nation's talent and economic landscape.

title: ICE slipping on ice: Video shows officer slip-and-fall amid heightened scrutiny ‚Äî watch
content: A video of an ICE officer falling on ice has gone viral, sparking criticism and reflecting public anger over a recent fatal shooting by an agent in Minnesota. The incident, following the controversial killing of Renee Good, has intensified scrutiny of the agency. Online reactions to the slip-and-fall clip highlight widespread frustration with ICE's actions and perceived incompetence.

title: Mitch Marner: 'I don‚Äôt root for any team other than my own' amid Leafs loyalty
content: Mitch Marner navigates a new chapter in Vegas after nine seasons with the Toronto Maple Leafs.  The shift has brought a reset, allowing him to shed hometown expectations and embrace new responsibilities, including playing center. While family remains a significant connection, Marner is focused on his current team's success, looking forward to future challenges rather than dwelling on the past.

title: Ceiling fan sold for cremation to Rs 157-cr business: Gwalior woman‚Äôs success story
content: An emotional story of a woman who, starting with no capital from her home, built a packaging powerhouse with a ‚Çπ157 crore turnover. Facing immense personal and financial adversity, her resilience, focus on quality, and innovative spirit propelled her to success, serving over 50,000 clients with sustainable solutions.

title: Bangladesh cricket in crisis: BCB sacks director after players boycott BPL
content: Bangladesh Cricket Board director M Nazmul Islam has been removed from all his duties. This decision came after cricketers demanded his resignation. The controversy erupted over his remarks regarding player remuneration and the country's potential withdrawal from the T20 World Cup. Players threatened to boycott cricket if he did not step down.

title: Denmark says Trump still wants Greenland; Russia raises alarm over troop build-up
content: Denmark insists the US still wants Greenland, despite European NATO nations deploying troops to the Arctic island, sparking Russian warnings.  A recent US-Danish meeting revealed a "fundamental disagreement" over the territory.  While a security working group is forming, Copenhagen maintains the US ambition remains, prompting a NATO reconnaissance mission amid fears of a geopolitical struggle.

title: Mamata vs ED: Bengal CM suffers SC blow; FIRs stayed, notices issued - what top court said
content: The Supreme Court has issued a notice to West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee and state officials regarding allegations by the ED of interference during raids on I-PAC. The court also restrained the state police from probing the FIR against ED.

title: Watch - Fire guts Porsche Taycan in MP; luxury car priced over Rs 2.4 cr
content: Porsche claims that the Turbo model can sprint from 0-100 kph in 2.7 seconds and the 4S takes 3.7 seconds. The 4S has an electronically limited top speed of 250 kmph, and the Turbo has a top speed of 260 kmph.

title: ‚ÄòLast chance for Giri, Caruana, Nakamura‚Äô: How those in 30s look before Candidates?
content: With the Candidates Tournament approaching, seasoned chess titans Hikaru Nakamura, Fabiano Caruana, and Anish Giri face what could be their final realistic shot at the world chess title. Despite their experience, younger players' vigour and complete skillsets pose a significant challenge, making this a pivotal moment for the established stars.

title: Watch: Air India plane engine damaged after it sucks in container
content: Air India's Airbus A350, en route to New York, returned to Delhi due to Iranian airspace closure. Subsequently, while taxiing in dense fog, an unsecured container was ingested into its right engine. The aircraft is now grounded for repairs, impacting Air India's widebody capacity and highlighting airside safety concerns.

title: Patrick Mahomes stays low-key as Brittany Mahomes marks milestone amid recovery doubts
content: Patrick Mahomes is staying largely out of the public eye as he continues his rehab following a season-ending knee injury. While his recovery timeline remains uncertain, his wife Brittany recently shared a family milestone, drawing attention to the quieter phase of Mahomes‚Äô career as he balances healing, home life, and preparation for his return.

title: What bothers Gen Z most at work? Imbalance, micromanagers, and no growth
content: Gen Z is redefining the modern workplace, but not without cost. Naukri‚Äôs report on over 23,000 professionals reveals mental health stressors rooted in poor work-life balance, stagnation, lack of meaningful recognition, and micromanagement. This generation seeks growth, autonomy, and boundaries, highlighting a silent crisis: the struggle to thrive at work without losing themselves to anxiety, fatigue, and disengagement.

title: Big blow! Washington Sundar racing against time to be fit for T20 World Cup - exclusive
content: India's T20 World Cup hopes face a significant setback as all-rounder Washington Sundar is battling a serious injury.  He is set to miss the upcoming T20 series against New Zealand and faces a race against time for the World Cup.  A thorough assessment at the BCCI Centre of Excellence will determine his recovery timeline.

title: Watch: Shashi Tharoor grooves to Taylor Swift's 'The Fate of Ophelia'; wins internet
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor delighted netizens by sharing an Instagram reel dancing to Taylor Swift's 'The Fate of Ophelia.'  The politician, amidst a mountain of work, showcased a playful side, humorously noting his transformation into a "Swiftie." The charming video, filmed in his study, quickly garnered a massive positive response online, with fans celebrating this unexpected pop culture moment.

title: Sleep optimization is the new fitness frontier, say experts
content: Fitness is shifting from prioritizing exhaustion to optimizing recovery, with sleep emerging as crucial for performance. Experts highlight sleep's role in muscle repair, hormone regulation, and cardiovascular health, while common mistakes like inconsistent schedules and screen time hinder progress. Prioritizing sleep is now seen as essential for achieving fitness goals.

title: Hardik Pandya flies kites with girlfriend Mahieka Sharma in Jaipur ‚Äì Watch
content: Hardik Pandya's festive kite-flying with Mahieka Sharma in Jaipur went viral, sparking discussions about his fitness.  Despite being sidelined from the ongoing ODI series against New Zealand due to bowling workload concerns, Pandya showcased strong all-round form in domestic cricket. He is expected to return for the upcoming T20I series, crucial for India's T20 World Cup preparations.

title: Bihar Woman, Her 3 Kids Found Dead 5 Days After They Went Missing
content: Police on Thursday recovered the bodies of a woman and her three children, five days after they went missing in Bihar's Muzaffarpur district, officials said.

title: Authorities Killed Canadian Citizen In Iran, Says Foreign Minister
content: A Canadian citizen has died in Iran at the hands of the Iranian authorities, Foreign Minister Anita Anand said.

title: 'Death Threats, Vandalism By Kuki Insurgents': Naga Body Files Police Case In Manipur
content: A village authority of the Naga tribes in Manipur has filed a police case alleging death threats and vandalism by insurgents of the Kuki National Front (KNF) in their village in Kangpokpi district, 45 km from the state capital Imphal.

title: Government Office Vandalised, Police Officer Injured In Bengal SIR Protests
content: A government office was vandalised and a police inspector was injured on Thursday as protests against the SIR of electoral rolls escalated in West Bengal's Uttar Dinajpur district.

title: Iran US Tension News LIVE Updates: Trump Convinced 'To Give Iran A Chance' After Threats
content: Iran said that it will defend itself "against any foreign threat," the country's Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi said on Thursday.

title: Explained: Why Iran Is Only Nation That Still Flies 'Top Gun' Fighter F-14
content: Over the decades, Iran has struggled to maintain its precious fleet of F-14. This led to cannibalisation of other F-14 in the fleet to ensure at least a decent number kept flying

title: On A Freezing Sankranti, Dahi Chuda Flavoured With Politics In Bihar
content: Dahi Chura feasts have become the flavour of the season in Bihar as the Makar Sankranti week is progressing. It is powering politics also, extending all the way from Patna to Delhi.

title: Petrol Poured On Man's Private Parts In Custody, 3 Bihar Cops Suspended
content: Three police officials have been suspended in Bihar after a jewellery store worker was thrashed in custody and petrol was poured on his private parts allegedly to force a theft confession.

title: Trump Threatens To Deploy Military In Minnesota Over Anti-ICE Protests
content: U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday threatened to use the Insurrection Act, which would allow him to deploy military forces, in Minnesota amid escalating tension over a deployment of federal agents in the state's most populous city.

title: India, US Trade Deal "Very Near", But Can't Put Deadline: Commerce Secretary
content: India is on track and "very close" to signing major trade deals with the US and the European Union (EU), Commerce Secretary Rajesh Agrawal said today.

title: Coast Guard Seizes Pak Boat With 9 Crew Members Inside Indian Waters
content: The Indian Coast Guard (ICG) has seized a Pakistani fishing boat with nine crew members inside Indian waters near the International Maritime Boundary Line, officials said on Thursday.

title: India To Bring Back Citizens Stranded In Iran, First Flight Tomorrow
content: India issued an urgent advisory for its citizens on Thursday to leave Iran and announced plans to evacuate them due to growing safety concerns amid ongoing unrest in the country.

title: Live Updates: 4 Exit Polls Predict Sweep For BJP-Led Coalition In Mumbai Civic Body BMC Election
content: Maharashtra Elections 2026 Voting Day: Voting across 29 municipal corporations was held across Maharashtra. A total of 3.48 crore voters were eligible to decide the fate of 15,931 candidates.

title: US Seizes Another Venezuelan Oil Tanker Ahead Of Trump-Machado Meeting
content: The United States has seized another Venezuela-linked tanker, two U.S. officials told Reuters on Thursday, ahead of a meeting between US President Donald Trump and Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado.

title: 'Do The Swifties Agree?' Shashi Tharoor Grooves To Hit Taylor Swift Song
content: Congress leader Shashi Tharoor has surprised fans by stepping into pop culture territory, and that too as a Swiftie, a term fondly used for fans of American singer-songwriter Taylor Swift.

title: After Bihar, Chhattisgarh Jewellery Markets Bar Entry Of Women With Burqa
content: A decision taken behind closed doors of jewellery markets across Chhattisgarh and Indore has triggered a storm that goes far beyond shop shutters and CCTV cameras, turning into a fierce debate over security, religious freedom, and political intent.

title: Hit By Kite String, Couple, Daughter Fall 70 Feet Off Surat Flyover, Killed
content: A family of three fell from a 70-foot-high flyover in Gujarat's Surat district after a kite string disbalanced their two-wheeler on Wednesday.

title: 3 Gulf Nations Convinced Trump To "Give Iran A Chance": Saudi Official
content: Saudi Arabia, Qatar and Oman led efforts to talk US President Donald Trump out of an attack on Iran, fearing "grave blowbacks in the region", a senior Saudi official said.

title: Terrorists Retreated, Were Still Killed: Op Sindoor Hero To NDTV
content: Immediately after the ghastly terror attack in Pahalgam last year, the Indian Army began preparations in line with their training, recounted a war hero, detailing how the forces responded to the chilling massacre of tourists.

title: What Led To Air India Engine Sucking In Cargo Container At Delhi Airport
content: India's aviation watchdog has launched a probe into the damage suffered by an Air India aircraft after a baggage container was sucked into one of its engines earlier this morning.

title: 'Head coach' vs. 'manager': What's the difference? Does it matter?
content: the difference between the job titles of "manager" and "head coach" may seem mere semantics at first glance . but events at Manchester United and Chelsea this month point to deeper structural problems . Ruben Amorim and Enzo Maresca chose to go public with frustrations they deemed unnecessary interference from the infrastructure around them .

title: Seven transfer targets who could improve any team this month
content: crystal palace defender Marc Guehi is a target for the big spending teams . the 19-year-old signed from leganes last summer for a fee of ‚Ç¨20 million . he has developed at a remarkable speed, especially when considering he only arrived in Spain from AS Frenzi in January 2025 .

title: How did Steelers end up here? Should they lean into a rebuild?
content: the Steelers were blown out 30-6 by a sloppy Texans team . it was the final game of Tomlin's tenure, as he stepped down . the steelers were second in scoring defense during his first season .

title: 'How many tackles can one man break!?' Remembering Tommie Frazier and the greatest run in national title history
content: quarterback Tommie Frazier scores a touchdown in the 1996 cornhuskers' win . he ducked under a defensive end late in the third quarter of the 1995 national championship . nine Gators got a hand on Frazier, but none could bring him down .

title: Ranking the top 25 women's players midway through 2025-26
content: Sarah Strong topped ESPN's preseason ranking of the 25 best players in women's college basketball for 2025-26 . she hasn't budged since, but the rest of the list has changed a lot . the SEC is the top conference with 13 players appearing on the midseason list .

title: Power Rankings: SEC shaping national title race
content: the day-to-day challenges of January are key in putting that picture together . the AP-ranked SEC currently has nine teams battling each other for supremacy . they have already met this season in a game that didn't count in the standings .

title: The Dodgers ... and everybody else? State of NL West with moves left to make
content: the los Angeles Dodgers shelled out close to $170 million last season . the gap between what they are capable of keeps widening, and that is stark within the confines of the National League West . a division L.A. has won in 12 of the past 13 years .

title: Which new coaches best rebuilt their 2025 recruiting classes?
content: the coaching carousel in college football turned at an unprecedented rate during the 2025 season . the core foundation of building a program remains the high school talent pipeline, which is still key to sustaining success and avoiding another coaching change in the not-too-distant future .

title: Wetzel: Never mind the jealous whispers about Indiana
content: college football has paid Curt Cignetti and the Indiana Hoosiers the ultimate compliment by digging into the question that was already being bantered about on social media . no one is going on the record with their suspicions, and no one even has a good angle to work . paranoia runs deep among the coaching ranks, though.

title: Power Rankings: How far Michigan, Iowa State, Vanderbilt drop after losses
content: the Wolverines and Cyclones have a long list of blowout victories . they own a 23-point road rout at Purdue . a shuffle in ESPN's Power Rankings has prompted a massive drop .

title: Kerala School Kalolsavam 2026: When theatre moved beyond¬†borders
content: The High School drama competiton at the State School Art Festival hit hard with tales of conflict and compassion and conscience in front of a full house

title: ‚ÄòMurder‚Äô of democracy: Opposition claims irregularities in Maharashtra civic polls
content: Polling for 29 municipal corporations across Maharashtra on January 15 drew sharp political reactions, with Mumbai‚Äôs high-stakes BMC contest at the centre. Opposition parties alleged voting irregularities, including concerns over indelible ink, voter lists and polling procedures, while election authorities rejected the claims and said complaints were being examined.

title: U.S. seizes Venezuela-linked tanker ahead of Trump-Machado meeting
content: The seizure ‚Äãmarks the sixth vessel targeted in recent weeks that was either carrying Venezuelan oil or had done so in the past. The officials, speaking on the condition of anonymity, said the seizure took place in the Caribbean

title: Barabanki MP says Uttar Pradesh SIRs show rural voters exceed total number of voters in State; SC asks Election Commission to explain
content: ‚ÄòAfter the Assembly SIR, the total number of voters in U.P. is shown as 12.56 crore, reflecting a reduction of about 2.89 crore voters. After the Panchayat SIR, the number of rural voters alone is shown as 12.69 crore, reflecting an increase of about 40 lakh voters,‚Äô the note read

title: At least 12 injured in group clash in Odisha‚Äôs Sundergarh; prohibitory order imposed, internet suspended
content: The incident took place in Regent Market area on Thursday (January 15, 2026) afternoon, police said, adding that the clash erupted over a minor argument between two youths

title: Democracy delivers in India as people are at centre of governance, says PM Modi
content: About 61 speakers and presiding officers from 42 Commonwealth nations are attending the CSPOC which is being hosted by India for the fourth time

title: AI, emerging tech have increased efficiency of democracy, says Om Birla; cautions against misuse
content: The Lok Sabha Speaker said the use of AI and digital technologies was¬†steadily increasing in the Parliament and State Legislatures

title: Top EU leaders to visit India as Republic Day guests; likely to sign trade deal
content: Commerce Secretary Rajesh Agrawal says both sides very close to EU-India trade deal, ‚Äúsensitive agricultural‚Äù items to be left out

title: Watch: The making of ‚Äòatchu vellam‚Äô, an ingredient in sweet Pongal
content: Veeramangudi, in Papanasam taluk of Tamil Nadu‚Äôs Thanjavur district, is known for its production of the soft and crumbly atchu vellam (jaggery set into cubical wooden moulds). Factories in and around the village produce approximately 245 tonnes of jaggery (7,000 bags of 35 kg each) annually. Of late though, these factories have started closing down due to an attack of yellow leaf disease in the sugarcane crop.

title: Panic grips Kashmiri parents as wards go incommunicado after Iran internet shutdown, street protests
content: The Jammu and Kashmir Students Association (JKSA) claimed that the first batch of students is likely to return to India on Friday (January 16, 2026)

title: Watch: Pongal celebrations light up Pudukottai
content: Residents of Meivazhi Salai in Tamil Nadu‚Äôs Pudukkottai district came together to celebrate the Pongal festival with joy, tradition and community spirit on Thursday. From festive decorations to ritual cooking of Pongal, the harvest festival reflected gratitude, unity and cultural pride.

title: 52 Maoists carrying ‚Çπ1.41 crore as reward surrender in Sukma
content: As part of the rehabilitation process, immediate financial assistance of ‚Çπ50,000 was provided to each cadre as an incentive

title: Deal with U.S. ‚Äòvery near‚Äô, teams are engaging virtually on pending issues: Commerce Secretary
content: The latest trade data, released on January 15, 2026, showed that India‚Äôs merchandise exports to the U.S. stood at a five-month high of $7.01 billion in December 2025, up from $6.89 in December 2024

title: Bengal SIR: Election Commission declines proposal to accept Class 10 admit card as valid document
content: The ECI noted that in accordance with the instructions issued on October 27, 2025, the madhyamik admit card is not recognised as a valid document for verification purposes

title: ‚ÄòSerious indictment‚Äô of Mamata: BJP over Supreme Court observation on ED plea in I-PAC raid caseami
content: Supreme court stayed the FIR filed in West Bengal against ED officials who raided the I-PAC office and the residence of its director, Pratik Jain, on January 8, 2026 and directed the State police to protect the CCTV footage of the raids.

title: Watch: How Tamil Nadu celebrated Pongal
content: Tamil Nadu erupted in festive joy on January 15 as across the state celebrated ‚ÄòThai Pongal‚Äô, the traditional harvest festival, with religious fervour and gaiety.

title: We are preparing for future wars; indigenisation key for self-reliance: Army Chief
content: General Dwivedi said that special emphasis is being placed on resources that are useful for both military and civilian purposes, contributing to the overall development of the country

title: Exports rise 1.87% to $38.5 billion in December: Commerce Secretary
content: Despite global uncertainties, India's exports are recording positive growth, Commerce Secretary Rajesh Agrawal says

title: Air India aircraft grounded after engine ingests cargo container; DGCA launches probe
content: The aircraft was operating a New Delhi‚ÄìNew York flight and returned to Delhi shortly after departure due to Iranian airspace restrictions

title: Uddhav Thackeray claims irregularities in Maharashtra civic polls, calls it 'murder' of democracy
content: The former Chief Minister also demanded the suspension of the State Election Commissioner over alleged irregularities in the municipal corporation polls

title: Omar speaks to Jaishankar on J&K students caught in Iran turmoil
content: The parents of Kashmiri students studying in Iran have appealed to the Centre to bring their children back amid the ongoing tensions

title: Supreme Court reserves verdict on plea to withdraw life-sustaining treatment for Harish Rana
content: The hearing highlighted the importance of the family taking a ‚Äúconsistent and well-considered‚Äù decision

title: CBI conducts searches in various parts of Kolkata in bank fraud case
content: The searches were being conducted at the residence of a businessman in the city's New Alipore area, and in New Town near the city, among other places, they said

title: BSP to contest all elections alone, including 2027 U.P. Assembly polls: Mayawati
content: There should be no confusion about this. The Bahujan Samaj Party (BSP) will contest the next Assembly elections in Uttar Pradesh alone, says BSP president Mayawati

title: Want to affix your nameplate: Kharge to PM on Manikarnika Ghat redevelopment
content: Protestors have opposed a demolition drive under the redevelopment plan of the Manikarnika Ghat and alleged damage to a century-old idol of Ahilyabai Holkar, a charge refuted by the district administration

title: Supreme Court stays Kolkata Police probe into ED officers, says ‚Äòlawlessness‚Äô may creep into other States
content: A Bench of Justices Prashant Kumar Mishra and Vipul Pancholi said they intend to issue notice and examine the matter. ‚ÄúThis is a very serious matter; we will issue a notice. We have to examine it,‚Äù it remarked orally.

title: Mehbooba Mufti wants Centre's intervention for safe return of students from Iran
content: According to estimates, a little over 10,000 Indians, including students, are currently living in Iran

title: Maharashtra civic polls: Opposition raises concerns over marker pens used instead of indelible ink, BMC to probe complaints
content: The ink on the finger after voting can be removed with a sanitiser. Instead of ink, pens are being used after voting, says Maharashta Navnirman Sena (MNS) Chief Raj Thackeray

title: Two sports trainees found dead in hostel in Kerala
content: The reason for the deaths is yet to be ascertained; police will record statements from other sportspersons in the hostel, their trainers and relatives, an official said

title: Indian Army stands as steadfast shield of nation: Kharge
content: On Indian Army Day, we bow in reverence and gratitude to our brave soldiers, veterans, ex-servicemen and their families, says Congress chief Mallikarjun Kharge

title: President Murmu, PM Modi hail Indian armed forces personnel on Army Day
content: PM Modi said the country remembers with deep respect those who have laid down their lives in the line of duty

title: At least five killed, ten injured in van-tractor collision in Bhopal
content: A pickup van headed for Narmadapuram and the tractor trolley collided head-on, Berasia police station inspector in-charge Vijendra Sen said

title: Maharashtra civic polls: Voting across 29 municipal corporations complete amid row over ink removal from fingers
content: Around 50% polling recorded, as per State Election Commissioner; vote count will take place on January 16

title: How are cryptocurrency exchanges in India vetting customers? | Explained
content: Cryptocurrency exchanges in India use a range of methods to verify their customers and prevent money-laundering and the financing of terrorism

title: Air India, IndiGo international flights impacted by Iran airspace closure
content: Air India said in a statement that some flights where currently rerouting is not possible are being cancelled

title: Maharashtra civic polls updates: Voting complete amid row over removing 'indelible' ink; voter turnout around 50%, SEC says
content: Maharashtra SEC Dinesh Waghmare said viral videos showing people removing ink from their fingers after casting vote are under investigation

title: Uproar as rats roam near beds, oxygen pipes in Gonda Hospital; Opposition raises concern for patient safety
content: With the video going viral, the Opposition alleged that the health infrastructure in the State is in a shambles

title: City coughs, sputters, as Bhogi fires burn; 4 stations record poor air quality
content: TNPCB data showed that in the 24 hours ending 8 a.m. on Tuesday, four stations out of 15, registered poor air quality

title: Watch: Pro-Khamenei rally held in Ladakh; hundreds gather near Lal Chowk in Kargil
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." title: Trump's Greenland push: Atlantic alliance cracks over Arctic
content: a pleading, deferential presentation by foreign ministers of Denmark and Greenland failed to move the White House from its declared objective of acquiring the Arctic territory . the breakdown has triggered an astonishing military activity, with european forces making tracks to Greenlund to stand up to Washington . talks ended without resolution .

title: Bihar Chief Secretary makes geo-spatial approval mandatory for DPRs of infra projects above ‚Çπ50 crore
content: Departments were instructed to incorporate geo-spatial inputs at the planning stage itself to avoid technical, administrative, and land-related obstacles at later stages.

title: Indore water contamination: Medical panel pegs death toll at 15
content: The panel, consisting of five doctors from the government-run Mahatma Gandhi Medical (MGM) College, has submitted a report to the State authorities confirming 15 deaths even as the official figure remains at six

title: Political parties make pitch for 2027 Punjab election at Maghi Mela
content: AAP govt. will make provision in budget to give ‚Çπ1,000 per month¬†to every woman, says Mann; Akali Dal chief lists poll promises; BJP holds first independent political rally at annual gathering

title: Suvendu warns West Bengal CM of legal action over coal scam remarks
content: In a post on X, the Leader of the Opposition claimed that the deadline given to Mamata Banerjee to respond to a defamation notice served by him had expired

title: Tej Pratap urges younger brother Tejashwi Yadav to merge RJD into his party
content: He said this on the occasions of Dahi-Chura feast which he has organised at his residence in Patna. Even his father and RJD Chief Lalu Prasad also attended the feast who had once expelled him from the party and snapped even family ties with him.

title: Kerala Kalolsavam 2026 | From melody to motion, students dazzle on festival stage
content: The 64th State School Arts Festival opens in Thrissur with dazzling performances by high school girls in the light music contest, alongside Mohiniyattam, group dance, and myriad art forms. Thousands of participants and spectators celebrate the talent, culture, and rich artistic heritage.

title: Union Minister welcomes INSV Kaundinya crew at Muscat port
content: Azzan Al Busaidi, under secretary, Tourism, Ministry of Heritage and Tourism of Oman, along with senior dignitaries from the Indian Navy, Royal Navy of Oman, Royal Oman Police Coast Guard, and other ministries were present.

title: Lokayukta registers case over large-scale government land scam in Nagamangala taluk
content: The accused include serving and former government officials and private individuals. A  criminal case has been registered against 11 persons in connection with the scam, and five government officials have been arrested.

title: Conditions favourable for cessation of NE monsoon; fog to continue in A.P.
content: Except for two, districts in Andhra Pradesh have either recorded excess or normal rainfall during south-west and north-east monsoon seasons

title:
Mumbai model to help build 
self-financing cities in Andhra Pradesh
content: A delegation from the State, during a recent two-day tour, studied advanced practices in regional governance, land-based financing, transit-oriented development and slum redevelopment in Mumbai Metropolitan Region

title: TET results sparks concern among in-service teachers, unions seek exemption

title: Australia classifies Indian students ‚Äòhigh-risk‚Äô, tightens visa scrutiny
content: It improves quality over quantity, say experts; this means requiring detailed financial proof, full traceability of source of funds, a strict ‚ÄòGenuine Student‚Äô assessment, which may include interviews, and slower and manual checks of documentation
